string-array.name: selfDoubt
string-array.item: To succeed in life, you need two things. ignorance and confidence
Believe in yourself, Have faith in your abilities. Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence
We gain strength, and courage, and confidence by each experience in which we really stop to look fear in the face, we must do that which we think we cannot
Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love
When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things
When a team outgrows individual performance and learns team confidence, excellence becomes a reality
With confidence, you have won before you have started
Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy
If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life
Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence
Confidence thrives on honesty, on honor, on the sacredness of obligations, on faithful protection and on unselfish performance. Without them it cannot live
Confidence comes from discipline and training.
You just have to be yourself and go full with confidence and be courageous
Honor bespeaks worth. Confidence begets trust. Service brings satisfaction. Cooperation proves the quality of leadership
Faith is a living, daring confidence in Gods grace, so sure and certain that a man could stake his life on it a thousand times
In fact, the confidence of the people is worth more than money
My style has changed and evolved mainly because I have grown to have more confidence in myself
It is best to act with confidence, no matter how little right you have to it
Great leaders do not need to act tough. Their confidence and humility serve to underscore their toughness
The circulation of confidence is better than the circulation of money
If you are presenting yourself with confidence, you can pull off pretty much anything
Health is the greatest possession. Contentment is the greatest treasure. Confidence is the greatest friend. Non-being is the greatest joy
Power without a nations confidence is nothing
Working with great people makes you great; you learn a lot and it also gives you the experience and confidence to move on with your own career
Being glamorous is about strength and confidence. It is black and white - dramatic. You have to be strong
My confidence is easy to shake. I am very well aware of all of my flaws. I am aware of all the insecurities that I have
Confidence does not come out of nowhere. It is a result of something, hours and days and weeks and years of constant work and dedication
When you have police officers who abuse citizens, you erode public confidence in law enforcement. That makes the job of good police officers unsafe
When you give a lot of confidence in people and you do not get it back, you are a bit disappointed, but its life
Style is whatever you want to do, if you can do it with confidence
Greed is the lack of confidence of ones own ability to create
The trust of the people in the leaders reflects the confidence of the leaders in the people
Leadership is a matter of having people look at you and gain confidence, seeing how you react If you are in control, they are in control
Censorship reflects a societies lack of confidence in itself
Whatever we expect with confidence becomes our own self-fulfilling prophecy
Peace is not an absence of war, it is a virtue, a state of mind, a disposition for benevolence, confidence, justice
If once you forfeit the confidence of your fellow-citizens, you can never regain their respect and esteem
Honesty is the cornerstone of all success, without which confidence and ability to perform shall cease to exist
The qualities I most admire in women are confidence and kindness
There is no worse screen to block out the Spirit than confidence in our own intelligence
It is not so much our friends help that helps us, as the confidence of their help.
If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life. With confidence, you have won even before you have started
All you need is ignorance and confidence and the success is sure
Confidence isnt optimism or pessimism, and its not a character attribute. Its the expectation of a positive outcome
The unutterable violence of the Holocaust shook our confidence in the possibility of telling any story of faith at all
I love the confidence that makeup gives me
As a young boy, scouting gave me a confidence and camaraderie that is hard to find in modern life
I tremble for my country when I hear of confidence expressed in me. I know too well my weakness, that our only hope is in God
I think the best way to have confidence is not to allow everyone elses insecurities to be your own
Whether you come from a council estate or a country estate, your success will be determined by your own confidence and fortitude
Fighters display two things. They display confidence, or they display a look that says, I am not sure
Doubt can motivate you, so do not be afraid of it. Confidence and doubt are at two ends of the scale, and you need both. They balance each other out
Confidence is the most important single factor in this game, and no matter how great your natural talent, there is only one way to obtain and sustain it. work
If you improve a teachers self-esteem, confidence, communication skills or stress levels, you improve that teachers overall effectiveness across the curriculum
It is only prudent never to place complete confidence in that by which we have even once been deceived
The man of genius inspires us with a boundless confidence in our own powers
Confidence in the goodness of another is good proof of ones own goodness
There is a difference between conceit and confidence. Conceit is bragging about yourself. Confidence means you believe you can get the job done
Faith is deliberate confidence in the character of God whose ways you may not understand at the time
The greater the artist, the greater the doubt. Perfect confidence is granted to the less talented as a consolation prize
Your teammates give you the confidence. They give me the confidence all year, all postseason
I think the most important thing about coaching is that you have to have a sense of confidence about what you are doing
I do not have the confidence to pull off a moustache
I think it takes a lot of confidence to be comfortable in being vulnerable
Girl power is about loving yourself and having confidence and strength from within, so even if you are not wearing a sexy outfit, you feel sexy
Confidence comes from hours and days and weeks and years of constant work and dedication
Confidence is contagious. So is lack of confidence
Analysis gave me great freedom of emotions and fantastic confidence. I felt I had served my time as a puppet
Confidence. If you have it, you can make anything look good
Besides pride, loyalty, discipline, heart, and mind, confidence is the key to all the locks
Kids made fun of me because I was a slow learner, because I was hyperactive, because of a lot of things. Running gave me confidence
Confidence is very sexy. You could be not cute at all and have such confidence
Only one man ever betrayed my confidence, and that only in a minor matter
I do not even know how to speak up for myself, because I do not really have a father who would give me the confidence or advice
To walk around with an ego is a bad thing. To have confidence in yourself is a great thing
Confidence is that feeling by which the mind embarks in great and honorable courses with a sure hope and trust in itself
Confidence in others honesty is no light testimony of ones own integrity
Confidence comes with maturity, being more accepting of yourself
Courage is a mean with regard to fear and confidence
When you win, you do not get carried away. But if you go step by step, with confidence, you can go far
Confidence and a good sense of humor can usually win a chick over
Conceit is bragging about yourself. Confidence means you believe you can get the job done
You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through
I know what it is like to feel that fear and the need of affirmation and appreciation. To build confidence in yourself is the toughest thing
It hass been a dream of mine to run my own summer camp. I went to one as a kid, and I put on productions, and got lots of confidence
The only thing that I can do is know that I have great confidence in raising children and being a great mother
Coaches can teach you two things, confidence and technique
We do not so much need the help of our friends as the confidence of their help in need
He who closes his ears to the views of others shows little confidence in the integrity of his own views
Most of the confidence which I appear to feel, especially when influenced by noon wine, is only a pretense
I was always looking outside myself for strength and confidence but it comes from within. It is there all the time
You need to play with supreme confidence, or else you will lose again, and then losing becomes a habit
I have always had confidence. It came because I have lots of initiative. I wanted to make something of myself
Confidence is a lot of this game or any game. If you do not think you can, you wont
I want to thank my parents for somehow raising me to have confidence that is disproportionate with my looks and abilities
I think confidence is the sexiest thing to have
My confidence comes from the daily grind - training my butt off day in and day out.
If you have money and you have fame, but you do not have any confidence in your blackness, then it is all for nothing
I am always impressed by confidence, kindness and a sense of humour
Confidence is everything in this business
Confidence is a very fragile thing
Golf is a matter of confidence. If you think you cannot do it, there is no chance you will
Confidence is a plant of slow growth in an aged heart
I have two bowls of confidence for breakfast each morning
I am a combination between extreme insecurity and extreme confidence
Confidence contributes more to conversation than wit
As is our confidence, so is our capacity
Confidence cannot find a place wherein to rest in safety
Confidence is something you are born with. I know I had loads of it even at the age of 15
Confidence is key. Sometimes, you need to look like you are confident even when you are not
I have had confidence in myself all along. It was just a matter of getting the pieces back in place
Religion is the possibility of the removal of every ground of confidence except confidence in God alone
I am consumed with the fear of failing. Reaching deep down and finding confidence has made all my dreams come true
I have confidence that we can form this kind of national community
I did not have any confidence in my beauty when I was young. I felt like a character actress, and I still do
Being successful at a very young age gave me the confidence and the capability to try out other things
Art helped give me confidence
Just be confident. I think confidence is the most attractive part of a person
Concentration comes out of a combination of confidence and hunger
